Room.Name: Inside the blasted gates
Room.Description: You are in the ruins of what was once either a small town or large fortress. Around you thick black smoke rises up from burnt buildings and bodies lie scattered beneath the rocks. The street way you are on continues north through the ruins, or you can go south back towards the muddy grounds of the swamp island.

Room.Name: On a burnt and blasted street
Room.Description: This street of the Legion fortress is covered in rubble from the recent attack by magic and physical might. The Arkham army has dealt a serious blow to the powers of Legion here, but something is not quite right. Far north at the end of the rubbled streets you can make out a large black tower that somehow seems almost unaffected by the battle that has reduced the rest of the region to ruins.

Room.Name: On a devestated street
Room.Description: The street here is totally destroyed. Buildings on either side have been reduced to mere rubble and the ground itself appears to have cracked open by some kind of tremendous force. Arkham's forces could not have created such destruction and you now notice that most of the bodies in the rubble wear the armor of Arkham guards. The street continues north and south.

Room.Name: On a ruined street
Room.Description: The street is blocked by rubble and debri from the previous battles. The side streets leading from this one are all collapsed and filled with impassable ruins. It is almost impossible to believe that Arkham's forces could have caused such destruction, and even stranger is the fact that almost all the corpses are of Arkham forces. To the north a large black tower stands tall above the ruins, unmarked by the battles and ominously quiet.

Room.Name: A dark cavern with a pentegram etched into the floor
Room.Description: You are in a small cave somewhere under the ground of Arkham's swamps. From somewhere nearby a chill wind blows around you. The only visible exit is to the south where the cave leads out into a narrow passage.

Room.Name: A dark cavern with a pentegram etched into the floor
Room.Description: You are in a small cave somewhere under the ground of Arkham's swamps. From somewhere nearby a chill wind blows around you. The only visible exit is to the south where the cave leads out into a narrow passage.

Room.Name: A dark cavern with a pentegram etched into the floor
Room.Description: You are in a small cave somewhere under the ground of Arkham's swamps. From somewhere nearby a chill wind blows around you. The only visible exit is to the north where the cave leads out into a narrow passage.

Room.Name: A dark cavern with a pentegram etched into the floor
Room.Description: You are in a small cave somewhere under the ground of Arkham's swamps. On the floor is a large pentegram that has been etched deep into the rock. From somewhere nearby a chill wind blows around you. The only visible exit is to the north where the cave leads out into a narrow passage.

Room.Name: In a narrow damp passage
Room.Description: You are in a roughly hewn passage somewhere deep beneath the Arkham swamps. The air here is stagnant and void of life. You can feel a chill wind blowing softly from somewhere to the east, while north and south of here you can see the passage ending at identical caves.

Room.Name: At a junction in the damp passage
Room.Description: The damp passageway comes to a t-junction here. To the north all appears black and a cold, chilling wind blows down it. To the east and west the passage continues and looks identical in both directions.

Room.Name: In a narrow damp passage
Room.Description: You are in a roughly hewn passage somewhere deep beneath the Arkham swamps. The air here is stagnant and void of life. You can feel a chill wind blowing softly from somewhere to the west, while north and south of here you can see the passage ending at identical caves.

Room.Name: In a dark damp tunnel sloping down
Room.Description: The tunnel slopes down sharply here into a black cavern from which thick wisps of mist can be seen swirling around in. To the south the tunnel heads into a t-junction.

Room.Name: In a mist filled cavern
Room.Description: This cavern is filled with a mist that lies heavily upon the cold rock floor. All around you a chilling cold breeze circulates and brushes the mist like a huge cobweb, revealing dark shapes within it. The cavern continues north, east and west.

Room.Name: Under a mist filled hole
Room.Description: You are standing in a deep, thick mist that swirls around you in a cold and chilling embrace. As it moves you see dark shapes of what look like lifeless zombie-like figures. The hole goes up from here or you can walk north, east and west into the misty cavern.

Room.Name: In a mist filled cavern
Room.Description: This cavern is filled with a mist that lies heavily upon the cold rock floor. All around you a chilling cold breeze circulates and brushes the mist like a huge cobweb, revealing dark shapes within it. The cavern continues north, east and west.

Room.Name: In a mist filled cavern
Room.Description: This cavern is filled with a mist that lies heavily upon the cold rock floor. All around you a chilling cold breeze circulates and brushes the mist like a huge cobweb, revealing dark shapes within it. The cavern continues all around you.

Room.Name: In a mist filled cavern
Room.Description: This cavern is filled with a mist that lies heavily upon the cold rock floor. All around you a chilling cold breeze circulates and brushes the mist like a huge cobweb, revealing dark shapes within it. The cavern continues all around you.

Room.Name: In a mist filled cavern
Room.Description: This cavern is filled with a mist that lies heavily upon the cold rock floor. All around you a chilling cold breeze circulates and brushes the mist like a huge cobweb, revealing dark shapes within it. The cavern continues all around you.

Room.Name: In a mist filled cavern
Room.Description: This cavern is filled with a mist that lies heavily upon the cold rock floor. All around you a chilling cold breeze circulates and brushes the mist like a huge cobweb, revealing dark shapes within it. The cavern continues all around you.

Room.Name: Above a gaping hole in the ground
Room.Description: Here near the middle of the cavern is a huge hole going down into the ground. The cold wind that blows through this underground part of Arkham's Legion is coming out of this hole in strong gusts. Thick wisps of the chilling mist rise out of the hole with the wind and circulate into the rest of the cave.

Room.Name: In a mist filled cavern
Room.Description: This cavern is filled with a mist that lies heavily upon the cold rock floor. All around you a chilling cold breeze circulates and brushes the mist like a huge cobweb, revealing dark shapes within it. The cavern continues all around you.

Room.Name: In a mist filled cavern
Room.Description: This cavern is filled with a mist that lies heavily upon the cold rock floor. All around you a chilling cold breeze circulates and brushes the mist like a huge cobweb, revealing dark shapes within it. The cavern continues east, south and west.

Room.Name: In a mist filled cavern
Room.Description: This cavern is filled with a mist that lies heavily upon the cold rock floor. All around you a chilling cold breeze circulates and brushes the mist like a huge cobweb, revealing dark shapes within it. The cavern continues east, south and west.

Room.Name: In a mist filled cavern
Room.Description: This cavern is filled with a mist that lies heavily upon the cold rock floor. All around you a chilling cold breeze circulates and brushes the mist like a huge cobweb, revealing dark shapes within it. The cavern continues east, south and west.

Room.Name: In a mist filled hole
Room.Description: You are in a deep hole filled with a cold mist and chilling wind. Above you the thick vapours rise out of the hole and into a dark cavern, while to the south you can make out the hole leading to a small ledge.

Room.Name: On a ledge overlooking a deep inverted cross
Room.Description: You stand on a ledge filled with a cold, almost evil, mist. Cold air blows up past you from down below where you can see the rock has been cut out to form the shape of a deep inverted cross. You can go back north on the ledge or climb down into the rocky hole that makes up the inverted cross.

Room.Name: In a deeply cut inverted cross
Room.Description: You stand at the base of what looks like an inverted cross dug deep into the rocks. A thick mist rises up all around you and obscures your view. You can climb up out of the pit or go south along the length of the 'cross'.

Room.Name: In a deeply cut inverted cross
Room.Description: You are in what seems to be an inverted cross cut into the very rocks. A cold thick mist swirls all around you and something cold and evil can be felt all around. You can go north or south along the trench that makes up the 'cross'.

Room.Name: At the hilt of a deeply cut inverted cross
Room.Description: The rocky trench branches of in all directions here. From the south a cold blast of chilling air can be felt, while east and west thick mist billows out.

Room.Name: In the left arm of the deep cut inverted cross
Room.Description: You are in a dead-end of the trench. Thick cold mist is rising up all around you from a small hole in the ground, but there is no possible way you could fit into the tiny opening. The only way out is back east.

ExtraDescription.Description: The hole is less than a few centimetres wide and, when you look into it, you can see nothing through the thick mist coming out of it. You do, however, hear what sounds like faint demonic laughter echoing from deep, deep within...

Room.Name: In the right arm of the deep cut inverted cross
Room.Description: You are in a dead-end of the trench. Thick cold mist is rising up all around you from a small hole in the ground, but there is no possible way you could fit into the tiny opening. The only way out is back west.

ExtraDescription.Description: The hole is less than a few centimetres wide and, when you look into it, you can see nothing through the thick mist coming out of it. You do, however, hear what sounds like faint demonic laughter echoing from deep, deep within...

Room.Name: At the head of a deeply cut inverted cross
Room.Description: You are at a dead-end in the inverted cross shaped trench. A freezing wind is coming from a small hole in the ground but there is no way you could ever fit into it. The only visible exit is back north.

ExtraDescription.Description: The hole is less than a few centimetres wide and, when you look into it, you can see nothing through the thick mist coming out of it. You do, however, hear what sounds like faint demonic laughter echoing from deep, deep within...

Room.Name: In a windy stairwell
Room.Description: You are on a winding stairwell going up and down through the tower. A strong gust of wind blows all around you as air rushes down the tower corridor that lead east and west from here.

Room.Name: In a wind scoured corridor
Room.Description: You are in a corridor leading east and west through the upper level of this tower. A burning acidic wind blows past you from the east. The corridor walls are etched with burn marks and show signs of corrosion.

Room.Name: In a wind scoured corridor
Room.Description: You are in a corridor leading east and west through the upper level of this tower. A burning acidic wind blows past you from the east. The corridor walls are etched with burn marks and show signs of corrosion. To the east you can see a set of stairs leading up to where the wind is blowing in from.

Room.Name: Under a large set of stairs
Room.Description: You are under some stairs heading up to an open platform on the eastern side of the Legion tower. A strong gust of biting, acidic wind rips down from above and rushes past you through the corridor. You can go up onto the platform or back west down the corridor.

Room.Name: In a warm wind scoured corridor
Room.Description: The corridor here in the tower's higher levels is very warm. A strong smell of smoke and burnt flesh blows past you from the west on a warm gust of air. To the east you can see a large winding stairwell.

Room.Name: In a hot scoured corridor
Room.Description: You are in a corridor leading east and west through the upper level of this tower. A hot, smokey wind blows past you from the west. The walls of the corridor are burnt and covered in soot. To the west you can see a set of stairs leading up to where the wind is blowing in from.

Room.Name: Beneath a stairwell
Room.Description: You are under some stairs heading up to an open platform on the western side of the Legion tower. A strong gust of hot, smoke laden wind rips down from above and rushes past you through the corridor. You can go up onto the platform or back west down the corridor.

Room.Name: On a blackened rocky platform
Room.Description: You stand upon a huge open platform covered in black soot. A strong wind from Arkham's swamps blows all around you and, this high up, it would be deadly to fall off the edge. A pair of massive depressions have been dug into the edge of the platform where a creature could mire it's claws for balance. The only exit is back down the stairs.

Room.Name: On a windy rock platform
Room.Description: You are on a huge open platform carved from rock. Small pools of black acid sizzle softly on the ground and etch deep markings into the floor. A strong gust of cold air pushes you around as the wind high over the Arkham swamps rushes by. The only exit is back down the stairs.

Room.Name: In a dark stairwell
Room.Description: You are at the top of some dark winding stairs. Below you the the stairs go down into unpenetrable darkness, while to the south you can just make out the black walls of another corridor.

Room.Name: In a dark corridor
Room.Description: The walls around you are narrow and threateningly narrow. A soft sound of maniacal laughter echoes around you, only to fade into the cold air. There is a door to the south, or you can follow the corridor east and west. To the north lies a dark stairwell leading down.

Room.Name: In a dark corridor
Room.Description: You are in a dark narrow corridor where the sounds of faint, cackling laughter can be heard. There is a door in the eastern wall, and the corridor continues north and west.

Room.Name: In a dark corridor
Room.Description: You are in a dark narrow corridor where the sounds of faint, cackling laughter can be heard. There is a door in the eastern wall, and the corridor continues north and south.

Room.Name: In a dark corridor
Room.Description: You are in a dark narrow corridor where the sounds of faint, cackling laughter can be heard. There is a door in the eastern wall, and the corridor continues south and west.

Room.Name: Beneath a windy stairwell
Room.Description: You are in a dark narrow corridor where the sounds of faint, cackling laughter can be heard. The corridor continues east and west, and there is a dark narrow stairwell going up onto a windy walkway.

Room.Name: In a dark corridor
Room.Description: You are in a dark narrow corridor where the sounds of faint, cackling laughter can be heard. There is a door in the western wall, and the corridor continues east and south.

Room.Name: In a dark corridor
Room.Description: You are in a dark narrow corridor where the sounds of faint, cackling laughter can be heard. There is a door in the western wall, and the corridor continues north and south.

Room.Name: In a dark corridor
Room.Description: You are in a dark narrow corridor where the sounds of faint, cackling laughter can be heard. There is a door in the western wall, and the corridor continues north and east.

Room.Name: In a small darkened cell
Room.Description: This prison cell is small and immersed in darkness. A faint evil laughter echoes from the very walls themselves as if placed there by powerful magic to drive the prisoners insane. The only exit is a door in the west wall.

Room.Name: In a small darkened cell
Room.Description: This prison cell is small and immersed in darkness. A faint evil laughter echoes from the very walls themselves as if placed there by powerful magic to drive the prisoners insane. The only exit is a door in the west wall.

Room.Name: In a small darkened cell
Room.Description: This prison cell is small and immersed in darkness. A faint evil laughter echoes from the very walls themselves as if placed there by powerful magic to drive the prisoners insane. The only exit is a door in the west wall.

Room.Name: In a small darkened cell
Room.Description: This prison cell is small and immersed in darkness. A faint evil laughter echoes from the very walls themselves as if placed there by powerful magic to drive the prisoners insane. The only exit is a door in the east wall.

Room.Name: In a small darkened cell
Room.Description: This prison cell is small and immersed in darkness. A faint evil laughter echoes from the very walls themselves as if placed there by powerful magic to drive the prisoners insane. The only exit is a door in the east wall.

Room.Name: In a small darkened cell
Room.Description: This prison cell is small and immersed in darkness. A faint evil laughter echoes from the very walls themselves as if placed there by powerful magic to drive the prisoners insane. The only exit is a door in the east wall.

Room.Name: Death
Room.Description: This room is DEATH!

Room.Name: Entrance to a darkened tower
Room.Description: You are in a dark and foreboding tower. The corridor heads north into it or south out into the ruins.

Room.Name: Within the darkened tower
Room.Description: You are in the entrance hall to the large tower that rises out of the Arkham swamps. From outside the noxious smell of deadly marsh vapours wafts in on a chilling breeze. Somewhere nearby you hear the cries of infernal suffering.

Room.Name: Within the darkened tower
Room.Description: You are in the entrance hall to the large tower that rises out of the Arkham swamps. From outside the noxious smell of deadly marsh vapours wafts in on a chilling breeze. Somewhere nearby you hear the cries of infernal suffering.

Room.Name: The foyer of the darkened tower
Room.Description: You are at the entrance foyer to the ominously dark tower. To the north you can make out a stairwell leading up, and east and west the corridor leads towards some doorways. South of here you can smell the noxious swamp vapours that blow in on the cold arkham air.

Room.Name: Before some rune covered doors
Room.Description: Here in the corridor's end are a pair of huge black doors covered in arcane runes of warding and protection. The corridor heads back east and the two doors lie set into the north and south walls.

Room.Name: Before some rune covered doors
Room.Description: Here in the corridor's end are a pair of huge black doors covered in arcane runes of warding and protection. The corridor heads back west and the two doors lie set into the north and south walls.

Room.Name: A room inscribed with a huge pentegram
Room.Description: You are within a black marble room with nothing but a massive pentegram etched permenantly into the floor. There is a huge black door in the south wall that leads back out.

Room.Name: A room inscribed with a huge pentegram
Room.Description: You are within a black marble room with nothing but a massive pentegram etched permenantly into the floor. There is a huge black door in the south wall that leads back out.

Room.Name: A room inscribed with a huge pentegram
Room.Description: You are within a black marble room with nothing but a massive pentegram etched permenantly into the floor. There is a huge black door in the north wall that leads back out.

Room.Name: A room inscribed with a huge pentegram
Room.Description: You are within a black marble room with nothing but a massive pentegram etched permenantly into the floor. There is a huge black door in the north wall that leads back out.

Room.Name: Below a winding black stairwell
Room.Description: You stand beneath a spiraling stairwell leading up into darkness where the sounds of infernal pain and suffering can be heard. To the south is the foyer of the tower, from which the swamp vapours of Arkham's marshlands can be smelled.

Room.Name: At the top of a winding black stairwell
Room.Description: You are at the top of a spiraling stairwell leading up from the ground floor of the down. Around you the walls are pitch-black and there is no light of any kind. The wails of suffering creatures echo around you in a maddening crescendo. The corridor heads south towards some doors, or you can go back down the stairs.

Room.Name: In a pitch-black corridor
Room.Description: The corridor here is totally dark with no light provided at all. It is almost as if those who live here no longer require the normal means to see things. In the east and west walls are large grey doors marked with symbols of dark magic. The corridor itself continues north and south.

Room.Name: In a pitch-black corridor
Room.Description: The corridor here is totally dark with no light provided at all. It is almost as if those who live here no longer require the normal means to see things. The corridor leads north and south.

Room.Name: In a pitch-black corridor
Room.Description: The corridor here is totally dark with no light provided at all. It is almost as if those who live here no longer require the normal means to see things. In the east wall if a door inscribed with an eclipsed moon, and in the west wall is a door painted with a blood-soaked pentegram. The corridor itself continues north and south.

Room.Name: Before a huge ebony grate
Room.Description: You are at the end of the corridor where a large grate of ebony steel blocks the way. Beyond the grate you can see a spiraling stairwell leading up into darkness. The corridor you are in heads back north.

Room.Name: The apprentice necromancer room
Room.Description: This room reeks of blood and decayed flesh. The hacked body parts of countless victims lie scattered about the room, discarded by whoever was using them. A couple of long tables with restraints lie in the corners of the room, both drenched in fresh blood and guts. The room leads off east and south, or you can leave it through the west door.

Room.Name: The apprentice necromancer room
Room.Description: This room reeks of blood and decayed flesh. The hacked body parts of countless victims lie scattered about the room, discarded by whoever was using them. A couple of long tables with restraints lie in the corners of the room, both drenched in fresh blood and guts. The room continues to the south and west.

Room.Name: The apprentice necromancer room
Room.Description: This room reeks of blood and decayed flesh. The hacked body parts of countless victims lie scattered about the room, discarded by whoever was using them. A couple of long tables with restraints lie in the corners of the room, both drenched in fresh blood and guts. The room continues to the north and east.

Room.Name: A bloody corner of the apprentice necromancer room
Room.Description: This room reeks of blood and decayed flesh. The hacked body parts of countless victims lie scattered about the room, discarded by whoever was using them. A couple of long tables with restraints lie in the corners of the room, both drenched in fresh blood and guts. The room continues to the north and west.

Room.Name: In a room covered in symbols of warding
Room.Description: You are within a large open room covered in burnt arcane runes protecting against creatures from the outer planes. On the walls, floors and ceiling are hundreds of runes of all sizes, ranging from tiny arrangements of dots to a massive hexagram for summoning and slaying practice demons. The room heads east and south from here.

Room.Name: In a room covered in symbols of warding
Room.Description: You are within a large open room covered in burnt arcane runes protecting against creatures from the outer planes. On the walls, floors and ceiling are hundreds of runes of all sizes, ranging from tiny arrangements of dots to a massive hexagram for summoning and slaying practice demons. The room heads south and west from here, and there is a grey door in the eastern wall.

Room.Name: In a room covered in symbols of warding
Room.Description: You are within a large open room covered in burnt arcane runes protecting against creatures from the outer planes. On the walls, floors and ceiling are hundreds of runes of all sizes, ranging from tiny arrangements of dots to a massive hexagram for summoning and slaying practice demons. The room heads north and east from here.

Room.Name: In a room covered in symbols of warding
Room.Description: You are within a large open room covered in burnt arcane runes protecting against creatures from the outer planes. On the walls, floors and ceiling are hundreds of runes of all sizes, ranging from tiny arrangements of dots to a massive hexagram for summoning and slaying practice demons. The room heads north and west from here.

Room.Name: A pitch-black room
Room.Description: It's pitch-black in here...you can't see a thing!

Room.Name: A pitch-black room
Room.Description: It's pitch-black in here...you can't see a thing!

Room.Name: A pitch-black room
Room.Description: It's pitch-black in here...you can't see a thing!

Room.Name: A pitch-black room
Room.Description: It's pitch-black in here...you can't see a thing!

Room.Name: In a torture room
Room.Description: This room is basically just one huge torture chamber. Dozens of nasty devices for inflicting pain and death are lined up around the room, and all show signs of frequent use. Severed body parts of now unrecognisable creatures are hanging by bloody shreds amongst the devices, making it looks like this is some kind of practice place for the evil beings who live here. To the west is a large grey door.

Room.Name: In a torture room
Room.Description: This room is basically just one huge torture chamber. Dozens of nasty devices for inflicting pain and death are lined up around the room, and all show signs of frequent use. Severed body parts of now unrecognisable creatures are hanging by bloody shreds amongst the devices, making it looks like this is some kind of practice place for the evil beings who live here.

Room.Name: In a torture room
Room.Description: This room is basically just one huge torture chamber. Dozens of nasty devices for inflicting pain and death are lined up around the room, and all show signs of frequent use. Severed body parts of now unrecognisable creatures are hanging by bloody shreds amongst the devices, making it looks like this is some kind of practice place for the evil beings who live here.

Room.Name: In a torture room
Room.Description: This room is basically just one huge torture chamber. Dozens of nasty devices for inflicting pain and death are lined up around the room, and all show signs of frequent use. Severed body parts of now unrecognisable creatures are hanging by bloody shreds amongst the devices, making it looks like this is some kind of practice place for the evil beings who live here.

Room.Name: At the base of a dark winding stairwell
Room.Description: You are at the bottom of a spiraling stairwell leading upwards into the dark confines of the tower. A huge ebony steel grate blocks the way north.

Room.Name: In a blood-soaked guard room
Room.Description: You have entered a large room soaked in blood and guts. Various body parts of victims being dragged to the higher levels for ritual sacrifice have been severed and left to rot here. Guard bunks line the walls of this room so the legion grunts can lie amongst the gore and become accostomed to it. To the east is a large ebony grate blocking a stairwell leading downwards, while the guard quarters head off north and west.

Room.Name: In a blood-soaked guard room
Room.Description: You have entered a large room soaked in blood and guts. Various body parts of victims being dragged to the higher levels for ritual sacrifice have been severed and left to rot here. Guard bunks line the walls of this room so the legion grunts can lie amongst the gore and become accostomed to it. The guard quarters head off north, east and west.

Room.Name: In a blood-soaked guard room
Room.Description: You have entered a large room soaked in blood and guts. Various body parts of victims being dragged to the higher levels for ritual sacrifice have been severed and left to rot here. Guard bunks line the walls of this room so the legion grunts can lie amongst the gore and become accostomed to it. The guard quarters head off north and east.

Room.Name: In a blood-soaked guard room
Room.Description: You have entered a large room soaked in blood and guts. Various body parts of victims being dragged to the higher levels for ritual sacrifice have been severed and left to rot here. Guard bunks line the walls of this room so the legion grunts can lie amongst the gore and become accostomed to it. The guard quarters head off south and west.

Room.Name: In a blood-soaked guard room
Room.Description: You have entered a large room soaked in blood and guts. Various body parts of victims being dragged to the higher levels for ritual sacrifice have been severed and left to rot here. Guard bunks line the walls of this room so the legion grunts can lie amongst the gore and become accostomed to it. The guard quarters continue east, south and west.

Room.Name: In a blood-soaked guard room
Room.Description: You have entered a large room soaked in blood and guts. Various body parts of victims being dragged to the higher levels for ritual sacrifice have been severed and left to rot here. Guard bunks line the walls of this room so the legion grunts can lie amongst the gore and become accostomed to it. The guard quarters head off south and east. There is a large black door with the symbol of an eclipsed moon in the north wall.

Room.Name: A room of blackest night
Room.Description: This room is darkened to a blackness purer than the blackest of unholy nights. From somewhere nearby you can hear the sounds of someone's heavy, rasping breath.

Room.Name: A room of blackest night
Room.Description: This room is darkened to a blackness purer than the blackest of unholy nights. From somewhere nearby you can hear the sounds of someone's heavy, rasping breath.

Room.Name: A room of blackest night
Room.Description: This room is darkened to a blackness purer than the blackest of unholy nights. From somewhere nearby you can hear the sounds of someone's heavy, rasping breath.

Room.Name: A room of blackest night
Room.Description: This room is darkened to a blackness purer than the blackest of unholy nights. From somewhere nearby you can hear the sounds of someone's heavy, rasping breath.

Room.Name: A room of blackest night
Room.Description: This room is darkened to a blackness purer than the blackest of unholy nights. From somewhere nearby you can hear the sounds of someone's heavy, rasping breath.

Room.Name: A room of blackest night
Room.Description: This room is darkened to a blackness purer than the blackest of unholy nights. From somewhere nearby you can hear the sounds of someone's heavy, rasping breath.

Room.Name: A room of blackest night
Room.Description: This room is darkened to a blackness purer than the blackest of unholy nights. From somewhere nearby you can hear the sounds of someone's heavy, rasping breath. To the north is a grey door.

Room.Name: A room of blackest night
Room.Description: This room is darkened to a blackness purer than the blackest of unholy nights. From somewhere nearby you can hear the sounds of someone's heavy, rasping breath.

Room.Name: A room of blackest night
Room.Description: This room is darkened to a blackness purer than the blackest of unholy nights. From somewhere nearby you can hear the sounds of someone's heavy, rasping breath.

Room.Name: In a pitch-black corridor
Room.Description: This corridor is pitch-black, with nothing but the warmth of fresh blood on the ground and floors to indicate where the darkness ends and the stone walls begin. In the south wall is the faint outline of a grey door spattered in rust coloured blood. The corridor heads east.

Room.Name: In a pitch-black corridor
Room.Description: This corridor is pitch-black, with nothing but the warmth of fresh blood on the ground and floors to indicate where the darkness ends and the stone walls begin. The corridor continues east and west.

Room.Name: In a pitch-black corridor
Room.Description: This corridor is pitch-black, with nothing but the warmth of fresh blood on the ground and floors to indicate where the darkness ends and the stone walls begin. To the east you can see the corridor ending at at large door outlined in a blood red glow.

Room.Name: Before a door bathed in a blood red glow
Room.Description: You stand in front of a huge door made of some black obsidian rock. A dull glow of blood red colour seeps out from behind it in a ghastly light. From beyond you can hear the sounds of heavy rasping and scraping.

Room.Name: NW corner of the undead roaming grounds
Room.Description: You are within the raising grounds for the necromancers of Arkham's Legion. A horrible glow of blood red bathes everything and through it you can see some of the corpses twitching and spasming on the ground with some kind of dark half-life. A large obsidian door is in the western wall, and the undead roaming grounds continue east and south.

Room.Name: Northern undead roaming grounds
Room.Description: You are within the raising grounds for the necromancers of Arkham's Legion. A horrible glow of blood red bathes everything and through it you can see some of the corpses twitching and spasming on the ground with some kind of dark half-life. The undead roaming grounds continue east, south and west.

Room.Name: NE corner of the undead roaming grounds
Room.Description: You are within the raising grounds for the necromancers of Arkham's Legion. A horrible glow of blood red bathes everything and through it you can see some of the corpses twitching and spasming on the ground with some kind of dark half-life. The undead roaming grounds continue south and west, and there is a blood soaked door in the eastern wall.

Room.Name: Western undead roaming grounds
Room.Description: You are within the raising grounds for the necromancers of Arkham's Legion. A horrible glow of blood red bathes everything and through it you can see some of the corpses twitching and spasming on the ground with some kind of dark half-life. The undead roaming grounds continue north, east and south.

Room.Name: Central undead roaming grounds
Room.Description: You are within the raising grounds for the necromancers of Arkham's Legion. A horrible glow of blood red bathes everything and through it you can see some of the corpses twitching and spasming on the ground with some kind of dark half-life. The undead roaming grounds spread out all around you.

Room.Description: You are within the raising grounds for the necromancers of Arkham's Legion. A horrible glow of blood red bathes everything and through it you can see some of the corpses twitching and spasming on the ground with some kind of dark half-life. The undead roaming grounds continue north, south and west.

The undead roaming grounds continue north, east and south.

The undead roaming grounds spread out all around you.

Room.Name: Eastern undead roaming grounds
Room.Description: You are within the raising grounds for the necromancers of Arkham's Legion. A horrible glow of blood red bathes everything and through it you can see some of the corpses twitching and spasming on the ground with some kind of dark half-life. The undead roaming grounds continue north, south and west.

Room.Name: SW corner of the undead roaming grounds
Room.Description: You are within the raising grounds for the necromancers of Arkham's Legion. A horrible glow of blood red bathes everything and through it you can see some of the corpses twitching and spasming on the ground with some kind of dark half-life. The undead roaming grounds continue north and east, and you can see a blood soaked door in the western wall.

Room.Name: Southern end of the undead roaming grounds
Room.Description: You are within the raising grounds for the necromancers of Arkham's Legion. A horrible glow of blood red bathes everything and through it you can see some of the corpses twitching and spasming on the ground with some kind of dark half-life. The undead roaming grounds continue north, east and west. To the south there is a large obsidian door with a fire-etched pentegram of warding upon it.

Room.Name: SE corner of the undead roaming grounds
Room.Description: You are within the raising grounds for the necromancers of Arkham's Legion. A horrible glow of blood red bathes everything and through it you can see some of the corpses twitching and spasming on the ground with some kind of dark half-life. The undead roaming grounds continue north and west, and you can see a blood soaked door in the eastern wall.

Room.Name: At the end of a narrow corridor
Room.Description: You are standing before a large obsidian door with nothing but darkness to keep you comfort. From the north, beyond the door, the sounds of flesh being torn and pulped can be heard. The corridor itself heads westwards into the darkness.

Room.Name: In a narrow corridor
Room.Description: The corridor is smelly and reeks of decayed flesh and excrement. The foul stench seems to be wafting in from the east, while west of here you can just make out a stairwell in the shadows.

Room.Name: Beneath the bone stairwell
Room.Description: You are at the base of a large stairwell that appears to be made from the spine of some massive beast. Above you the chilling air of Arkham blows down upon you and a dark grey sky can be seen. To the east a foul stench of death comes wafting in from the darkness.

Room.Name: The skeleton raising room
Room.Description: This rooms contains the remains of countless skeletons, mostly crushed and charred beyond use. Horrible skulls grin up at you in silent mockery and a smell of rotted flesh lingers in the air from the magic used to strip the bodies of their mortal flesh. A door lies in the west wall, leading back into the undead roaming grounds.

Room.Name: A corpse filled room
Room.Description: This rooms is litterly carpeted with the bodies of countless victims. No matter where you step blood and flesh pulp beneath your feet. There is a door leading back west into the roaming grounds where the final product of the necromancers are left to roam.

Room.Name: In a room filled with knee-deep blood
Room.Description: This room is pretty much a large indoor pool of sticky deep blood. The bodies on the floor are partially raised to drain their blood out and the dried out corpses are then prepared for full mummification by Legion's more able mages. A blood soaked door heads back east into roaming grounds where most of the necromantic end-products are left to wander.

Room.Name: On a windy walkway
Room.Description: You stand upon a long, wide walkway at the top of the tower. Strong gusts of chilling wind blow against you and the sounds of dark arcane chanting echo faintly on the winds. There is a huge spine of some beast in the ground here, allowing you to climb back down into the tower. The walkway continues east and west.

Room.Name: On a windy walkway
Room.Description: You stand upon a long, wide walkway at the top of the tower. Strong gusts of chilling wind blow against you and the sounds of dark arcane chanting echo faintly on the winds. The walkway continues east and west.

Room.Name: Before a pair of black turrets
Room.Description: You are on a windy walkway at the top of the tower. Before you, in the north and south walls of the walkway, are a pair of huge obsidian doors leading to some wide black turrets that rise up above the roof of the tower. The sounds of arcane chanting can be heard from inside the turrets. The walkway continues back west from here.

Room.Name: On a windy walkway
Room.Description: You stand upon a long, wide walkway at the top of the tower. Strong gusts of chilling wind blow against you and the sounds of dark arcane chanting echo faintly on the winds. The walkway continues east and west.

Room.Name: Before a pair of black turrets
Room.Description: You are on a windy walkway at the top of the tower. Before you, in the north and south walls of the walkway, are a pair of huge obsidian doors leading to some wide black turrets that rise up above the roof of the tower. Sounds of arcane chanting can be heard from inside. The walkway continues back east from here.

Room.Name: Bottom of a ebony stairwell
Room.Description: You are in a room filled with some kind of soul tearing darkness. A cold and deathly chill seeps through you every second you stand here, and there seems to be some kind of dark magic slowly building up from all around. A black stairwell is here, rising up into the tower.

Room.Name: A room of Hungry Shadows
Room.Description: You are in a room filled with some kind of soul tearing darkness. A cold and deathly chill seeps through you every second you stand here, and there seems to be some kind of dark magic slowly building up from all around. The turret room continues east, south and west.

Room.Name: A room of Hungry Shadows
Room.Description: You are in a room filled with some kind of soul tearing darkness. A cold and deathly chill seeps through you every second you stand here, and there seems to be some kind of dark magic slowly building up from all around. The turret room continues south and west.

Room.Name: A room of Hungry Shadows
Room.Description: You are in a room filled with some kind of soul tearing darkness. A cold and deathly chill seeps through you every second you stand here, and there seems to be some kind of dark magic slowly building up from all around. The turret room continues north, east and south.

Room.Name: A room of Hungry Shadows
Room.Description: You are in a room filled with some kind of soul tearing darkness. A cold and deathly chill seeps through you every second you stand here, and there seems to be some kind of dark magic slowly building up from all around. The turret room continues all around you.

Room.Name: A room of Hungry Shadows
Room.Description: You are in a room filled with some kind of soul tearing darkness. A cold and deathly chill seeps through you every second you stand here, and there seems to be some kind of dark magic slowly building up from all around. The turret room continues north, south and west.

Room.Name: A room of Hungry Shadows
Room.Description: You are in a room filled with some kind of soul tearing darkness. A cold and deathly chill seeps through you every second you stand here, and there seems to be some kind of dark magic slowly building up from all around. The turret room continues north and east.

Room.Name: Entrance to the Nightwalker's domain
Room.Description: You are in a room filled with some kind of soul tearing darkness. A cold and deathly chill seeps through you every second you stand here, and there seems to be some kind of dark magic slowly building up from all around. From the darkness the faint whispery shapes of deadly creatures flicker in and out of existence, as if not truly here but trying to materialise. A large obsidian door lies in the south wall.

Room.Name: A room of Hungry Shadows
Room.Description: You are in a room filled with some kind of soul tearing darkness. A cold and deathly chill seeps through you every second you stand here, and there seems to be some kind of dark magic slowly building up from all around. The turret room continues north and west.

Room.Name: The anti-paladin's abattoir
Room.Description: This looks like a butchers shop, only the corpses being hacked up are of elven, human and dwarven origin. Many look like children and there's quite a few that you are certain must be from the same families. It looks like a slaughter of Arkham's people, as well as those of other Orthosi cities, has been going on recently. The turret room heads east and south.

Room.Name: The anti-paladin's abattoir
Room.Description: This looks like a butchers shop, only the corpses being hacked up are of elven, human and dwarven origin. Many look like children and there's quite a few that you are certain must be from the same families. It looks like a slaughter of Arkham's people, as well as those of other Orthosi cities, has been going on recently. The turret continues east, south and west, while to the north is a door leading back out onto the open walkway.

Room.Name: The anti-paladin's abattoir
Room.Description: This looks like a butchers shop, only the corpses being hacked up are of elven, human and dwarven origin. Many look like children and there's quite a few that you are certain must be from the same families. It looks like a slaughter of Arkham's people, as well as those of other Orthosi cities, has been going on recently. The turret continues south and west.

Room.Name: The anti-paladin's abattoir
Room.Description: This looks like a butchers shop, only the corpses being hacked up are of elven, human and dwarven origin. Many look like children and there's quite a few that you are certain must be from the same families. It looks like a slaughter of Arkham's people, as well as those of other Orthosi cities, has been going on recently. The turret continues north, east and south from here.

Room.Name: The anti-paladin's abattoir

Many look like children and there's quite a few that you are certain must be from the same families. It looks like a slaughter of Arkham's people, as well as those of other Orthosi cities, has been going on recently. The turret continues all around you.

Room.Description: This looks like a butchers shop, only the corpses being hacked up are of elven, human and dwarven origin. Many look like children and there's quite a few that you are certain must be from the same families. It looks like a slaughter of Arkham's people, as well as those of other Orthosi cities, has been going on recently. The turrent continues to the north, south and west.

Room.Name: Bottom of a pile of corpses
Room.Description: Here in this room of slaughter there is an extra large pile of corpses built up to provide a mangled messy stairway up onto the turret's roof. The bloody turret room continues north and east from here.

Room.Name: The anti-paladin's abattoir
Room.Description: This looks like a butchers shop, only the corpses being hacked up are of elven, human and dwarven origin. Many look like children and there's quite a few that you are certain must be from the same families. It looks like a slaughter of Arkham's people, as well as those of other Orthosi cities, has been going on recently. You can go north, east and west from here.

Room.Name: The anti-paladin's abattoir
Room.Description: This looks like a butchers shop, only the corpses being hacked up are of elven, human and dwarven origin. Many look like children and there's quite a few that you are certain must be from the same families. It looks like a slaughter of Arkham's people, as well as those of other Orthosi cities, has been going on recently. The turret continues north and west.

Room.Name: The turret of Blood Summons
Room.Description: This turret is one huge room with a myriad of sacrifical runes etched into the floor. Small shallow grooves have been carved into the rocky floor and blood flows through them, mixing and converging at points that describe a single huge pentegram. The room continues east and south.

Room.Name: The turret of Blood Summons
Room.Description: This turret is one huge room with a myriad of sacrifical runes etched into the floor. Small shallow grooves have been carved into the rocky floor and blood flows through them, mixing and converging at points that describe a single huge pentegram. The room continues east, south and west.

Room.Name: Beneath a small stairwell
Room.Description: This turret is one huge room with a myriad of sacrifical runes etched into the floor. Small shallow grooves have been carved into the rocky floor and blood flows through them, mixing and converging at points that describe a single huge pentegram. The room continues south and west. In the northwest corner you can see a set of stairs leading up onto the top of the turret.

Room.Name: The turret of Blood Summons
Room.Description: This turret is one huge room with a myriad of sacrifical runes etched into the floor. Small shallow grooves have been carved into the rocky floor and blood flows through them, mixing and converging at points that describe a single huge pentegram. The room continues north, east and south.

Small shallow grooves have been carved into the rocky floor and blood flows through them, mixing and converging at points that describe a single huge pentegram. The room continues all around you.

Room.Name: The turret of Blood Summons
Room.Description: This turret is one huge room with a myriad of sacrifical runes etched into the floor. Small shallow grooves have been carved into the rocky floor and blood flows through them, mixing and converging at points that describe a single huge pentegram. The room continues north, south and west.

Room.Name: The turret of Blood Summons
Room.Description: This turret is one huge room with a myriad of sacrifical runes etched into the floor. Small shallow grooves have been carved into the rocky floor and blood flows through them, mixing and converging at points that describe a single huge pentegram. The room continues north and east.

Room.Name: The turret of Blood Summons
Room.Description: This turret is one huge room with a myriad of sacrifical runes etched into the floor. Small shallow grooves have been carved into the rocky floor and blood flows through them, mixing and converging at points that describe a single huge pentegram. The deathly room continues north, east and west. To the south is a large obsidian door.

Room.Name: The turret of Blood Summons
Room.Description: This turret is one huge room with a myriad of sacrifical runes etched into the floor. Small shallow grooves have been carved into the rocky floor and blood flows through them, mixing and converging at points that describe a single huge pentegram. The room continues north and west.

Room.Name: The room of unspeakable Creators
Room.Description: This room is filled with a soft necromantic chanting that seems to come from the air itself. All around you there are corpses lying on the ground in some kind of twisted arrangement. The room continues east and south.

Room.Name: The room of unspeakable Creators
Room.Description: This room is filled with a soft necromantic chanting that seems to come from the air itself. All around you there are corpses lying on the ground in some kind of twisted arrangement. The room continues east and south. To the north is a large obsidian door.

Room.Name: The room of unspeakable Creators
Room.Description: This room is filled with a soft necromantic chanting that seems to come from the air itself. All around you there are corpses lying on the ground in some kind of twisted arrangement. The room continues south and west.

Room.Name: The room of unspeakable Creators
Room.Description: This room is filled with a soft necromantic chanting that seems to come from the air itself. All around you there are corpses lying on the ground in some kind of twisted arrangement. The room continues north, east and south.

Room.Name: The room of unspeakable Creators
Room.Description: This room is filled with a soft necromantic chanting that seems to come from the air itself. All around you there are corpses lying on the ground in some kind of twisted arrangement. The room continues all around you.

Room.Name: The room of unspeakable Creators
Room.Description: This room is filled with a soft necromantic chanting that seems to come from the air itself. All around you there are corpses lying on the ground in some kind of twisted arrangement. The room continues north, south and west.

Room.Name: The room of unspeakable Creators
Room.Description: This room is filled with a soft necromantic chanting that seems to come from the air itself. All around you there are corpses lying on the ground in some kind of twisted arrangement. The room continues north and east.

Room.Name: The room of unspeakable Creators
Room.Description: This room is filled with a soft necromantic chanting that seems to come from the air itself. All around you there are corpses lying on the ground in some kind of twisted arrangement. The room continues north, east and west.

Room.Name: Beneath a blood stained stairwell
Room.Description: You are standing in the corner of a large turret filled with mangled corpses. A soft necromantic chanting seems to come from the air itself and every now and then one of the corpses twitches as something unholy briefly touches it before moving on. The room continues north and west, while the stairs lead upwards onto the top of the turret.

Room.Name: On the roof of a black turret
Room.Description: The air here is chillingly cold and a powerful wind blasts at you from the dark grey skies. Looking over the edge of the walls you can see tiny figures moving way down below at the base of the tower, preparing their assault. The roof continues east and south, and there is an ebony stairwell going down.

Room.Name: On the roof of a black turret
Room.Description: The air here is chillingly cold and a powerful wind blasts at you from the dark grey skies. To the south the wind is being pulled inwards toward a huge vortex of horrible darkness. The roof continues east, south and west.

Room.Name: On the roof of a black turret
Room.Description: The air here is chillingly cold and a powerful wind blasts at you from the dark grey skies. Looking over the edge of the tower you can just make out the small figures of arkham's warriors as they prepare their assault on legion's tower. The roof continues south and west.

Room.Name: On the roof of a black turret
Room.Description: The air here is chillingly cold and a powerful wind blasts at you from the dark grey skies. To the east the wind is being drawn into a huge vortex of pitch-black matter. The roof continues north, south and east.

Room.Name: Before a vortex of purest night
Room.Description: Here at the centre of the black turret is a huge vortex reaching up into the sky. Air is being drawn into it with a howling sound, and nothing seems to escape once it is touched. The roof continues all around you, and the vortex itself draws upwards into whatever abyss it comes from...

Room.Name: On the roof of a black turret
Room.Description: The air here is chillingly cold and a powerful wind blasts at you from the dark grey skies. West of here the air is being sucked inwards toward a huge black vortex of nothingness. The roof continues north, south and west.

Room.Name: On the roof of a black turret
Room.Description: The air here is chillingly cold and a powerful wind blasts at you from the dark grey skies. Looking over the edge of the walls you can see tiny figures moving way down below at the base of the tower, preparing their assault. The roof continues north and east.

Room.Name: On the roof of a black turret
Room.Description: The air here is chillingly cold and a powerful wind blasts at you from the dark grey skies. To the north there is a huge black vortex drawing in the air from all around it. The roof continues north, east and west.

Room.Name: On the roof of a black turret
Room.Description: The air here is chillingly cold and a powerful wind blasts at you from the dark grey skies. Looking over the edge of the walls you can see tiny figures moving way down below at the base of the tower, preparing their assault. The roof continues north and west.

Room.Name: On a pentegram inscribed roof
Room.Description: You are on the very top of one of the tower's turrets. From here the wind blows with gale force strength, threatening to blast you over the edge and down to the ground far far below. The stone surface is smooth and perfectly clean except for a single, massive pentegram drawn across it in thick dried blood. The roof continues east and south.

Room.Name: On a pentegram inscribed roof
Room.Description: You are on the very top of one of the tower's turrets. From here the wind blows with gale force strength, threatening to blast you over the edge and down to the ground far far below. The stone surface is smooth and perfectly clean except for a single, massive pentegram drawn across it in thick dried blood. The roof continues east, south and west.

Room.Name: On a pentegram inscribed roof
Room.Description: You are on the very top of one of the tower's turrets. From here the wind blows with gale force strength, threatening to blast you over the edge and down to the ground far far below. The stone surface is smooth and perfectly clean except for a single, massive pentegram drawn across it in thick dried blood. The roof continues south and west, and there is a stairwell down.

Room.Name: On a pentegram inscribed roof
Room.Description: You are on the very top of one of the tower's turrets. From here the wind blows with gale force strength, threatening to blast you over the edge and down to the ground far far below. The stone surface is smooth and perfectly clean except for a single, massive pentegram drawn across it in thick dried blood. The roof continues north, east and south.

Room.Name: In the centre of a massive pentegram
Room.Description: You are on the very top of one of the tower's turrets. Here in the middle of the tower the bloody pentegram crosses and converges into a large open space. Within the central part of the rune are dozens of smaller inscriptions of warding and protection. The roof continues all around you.

Room.Name: On a pentegram inscribed roof
Room.Description: You are on the very top of one of the tower's turrets. From here the wind blows with gale force strength, threatening to blast you over the edge and down to the ground far far below. The stone surface is smooth and perfectly clean except for a single, massive pentegram drawn across it in thick dried blood. The roof continues north, south and west.

Room.Name: On a pentegram inscribed roof
Room.Description: You are on the very top of one of the tower's turrets. From here the wind blows with gale force strength, threatening to blast you over the edge and down to the ground far far below. The stone surface is smooth and perfectly clean except for a single, massive pentegram drawn across it in thick dried blood. The roof continues north and east.

Room.Description: You are on the very top of one of the tower's turrets. From here the wind blows with gale force strength, threatening to blast you over the edge and down to the ground far far below. The stone surface is smooth and perfectly clean except for a single, massive pentegram drawn across it in thick dried blood. The roof continues north, east and west.

Room.Description: You are on the very top of one of the tower's turrets. From here the wind blows with gale force strength, threatening to blast you over the edge and down to the ground far far below. The stone surface is smooth and perfectly clean except for a single, massive pentegram drawn across it in thick dried blood. The roof continues north and west.

Room.Name: On the roof of a black turret
Room.Description: You are high up on the very roof of one of the tower's four turrets. The wind blasts at you with fierce intensity, threatening to blow you over the edge and down to the ground far, far below. The roof continues east and south.

Room.Name: On the roof of a black turret
Room.Description: You are high up on the very roof of one of the tower's four turrets. The wind blasts at you with fierce intensity, threatening to blow you over the edge and down to the ground far, far below. The roof continues east, south and west.

Room.Name: On the roof of a black turret
Room.Description: You are high up on the very roof of one of the tower's four turrets. The wind blasts at you with fierce intensity, threatening to blow you over the edge and down to the ground far, far below. The roof continues south and west.

Room.Name: On the roof of a black turret
Room.Description: You are high up on the very roof of one of the tower's four turrets. The wind blasts at you with fierce intensity, threatening to blow you over the edge and down to the ground far, far below. The roof continues north. east and south.

Room.Name: Centre of a black turret's roof
Room.Description: You are high up on the very roof of one of the tower's four turrets. A huge set of titanium chains are melted into the stone floor and would easily be able to contain even the most powerful of beings. The roof continues all around you.

Room.Name: On the roof of a black turret
Room.Description: You are high up on the very roof of one of the tower's four turrets. The wind blasts at you with fierce intensity, threatening to blow you over the edge and down to the ground far, far below. The roof continues north, south and west.

Room.Name: On the roof of a black turret
Room.Description: You are high up on the very roof of one of the tower's four turrets. The wind blasts at you with fierce intensity, threatening to blow you over the edge and down to the ground far, far below. The roof continues north and east, and there is a hole in the roof leading down onto a pile of corpses within the turret.

Room.Name: On the roof of a black turret
Room.Description: You are high up on the very roof of one of the tower's four turrets. The wind blasts at you with fierce intensity, threatening to blow you over the edge and down to the ground far, far below. The roof continues north, east and west.

Room.Name: On the roof of a black turret
Room.Description: You are high up on the very roof of one of the tower's four turrets. The wind blasts at you with fierce intensity, threatening to blow you over the edge and down to the ground far, far below. The roof continues north and west.

Room.Name: On the blood soaked roof of a black turret
Room.Description: This turret's roof is covered in a thick layer of sticky, cold blood. The howling winds over arkham's swamp blasts at you mercilessly and you find it hard to balance on the slick surface. Far below you the tiny figures of arkham's soldiers can be seen preparing their assault on the Legion. The turret roof continues east and south.

Room.Name: On the blood soaked roof of a black turret
Room.Description: This turret's roof is covered in a thick layer of sticky, cold blood. The howling winds over arkham's swamp blasts at you mercilessly and you find it hard to balance on the slick surface. The turret roof continues east, south and west.
