Room.Name: On the blood soaked roof of a black turret
Room.Description: This turret's roof is covered in a thick layer of sticky, cold blood. The howling winds over arkham's swamp blasts at you mercilessly and you find it hard to balance on the slick surface. Far below you the tiny figures of arkham's soldiers can be seen preparing their assault on the Legion. The turret roof continues north, east and west.

Room.Name: On the blood soaked roof of a black turret
Room.Description: This turret's roof is covered in a thick layer of sticky, cold blood. The howling winds over arkham's swamp blasts at you mercilessly and you find it hard to balance on the slick surface. Far below you the tiny figures of arkham's soldiers can be seen preparing their assault on the Legion. The turret roof continues north and west. There is a blood stained stairwell also leading back down into the turret.

Room.Name: On a wooden walkway over the swamp
Room.Description: You are on a narrow and treacherous walkway that barely rises above the swamp muck all around you. Dirty thick waters lap at your feet as you walk along it and the stench of foul odours cling to everything in sight. Something plops in the muddy bogs and somewhere else a loud squelch can be heard from another local beast. The walkway continues east and west.

Room.Name: On a wooden walkway over the swamp
Room.Description: The walkway here rises over the swamp just enough to prevent the murky waters from lapping at your feet. All around you strange sounds of swamp life can be heard and the foul odours threaten to choke you. The walkway continues east and west.

Room.Name: On a wooden walkway over the swamp
Room.Description: The walkway here rises over the swamp just enough to prevent the murky waters from lapping at your feet. All around you strange sounds of swamp life can be heard and the foul odours threaten to choke you. The walkway continues east and west.

Room.Name: At a bend on the wooden walkway
Room.Description: You are at a bend on the wooden plank walkway that leads over the watery part of the swamp. To the north you can make out an island within the swamp and a large, dark structure looming over it all further inland. The sounds of loud voices and people in some kind of working frenzy can be heard. The walkway leads west, or north to where it ends at the edge of the island.

Room.Name: On a muddy island battlefield
Room.Description: You are on a small island in the middle of Arkham's swamps. Around you there are wooden barricades being erected for some oncoming seige upon the dark structure to the north of the island. All around you the sounds of men yelling and rushing about in a working frenzy can be heard. To the west you can see a small wooden tower rising over the island. The island continues north and east.

Room.Name: On a muddy island battlefield
Room.Description: You are on a small island in the middle of Arkham's swamps. Around you there are wooden barricades being erected for some oncoming seige upon the dark structure to the north of the island. All around you the sounds of men yelling and rushing about in a working frenzy can be heard. The island continues north, east and west.

Room.Name: At the edge of a wooden walkway
Room.Description: You are on the very end of a small wooden walkway. The wood balances upon the edge of the small swamp island and extends southwards to where the walkway heads. Further north on the island you can make out a large dark structure of some kind that looms ominously over the island. East and west the island continues.

Room.Name: On a muddy island battlefield
Room.Description: You are on a small island in the middle of Arkham's swamps. Around you there are wooden barricades being erected for some oncoming seige upon the dark structure to the north of the island. All around you the sounds of men yelling and rushing about in a working frenzy can be heard. The island continues north, east and west.

Room.Name: On a muddy island battlefield
Room.Description: You are on a small island in the middle of Arkham's swamps. Around you there are wooden barricades being erected for some oncoming seige upon the dark structure to the north of the island. All around you the sounds of men yelling and rushing about in a working frenzy can be heard. The island continues all around you.

Room.Name: On a muddy island battlefield
Room.Description: You are on a small island in the middle of Arkham's swamps. Around you there are wooden barricades being erected for some oncoming seige upon the dark structure to the north of the island. All around you the sounds of men yelling and rushing about in a working frenzy can be heard. The island continues north, south and west. To the east is a small wooden tower built in a small corner of the island.

Room.Name: On a muddy island battlefield
Room.Description: You are on a small island in the middle of Arkham's swamps. Around you there are wooden barricades being erected for some oncoming seige upon the dark structure to the north of the island. All around you the sounds of men yelling and rushing about in a working frenzy can be heard. The island continues north and east.

Room.Name: On a muddy island battlefield
Room.Description: You are on a small island in the middle of Arkham's swamps. Around you there are wooden barricades being erected for some oncoming seige upon the dark structure to the north of the island. All around you the sounds of men yelling and rushing about in a working frenzy can be heard. The island continues north, east and west.

Room.Name: On a muddy island battlefield
Room.Description: You are on a small island in the middle of Arkham's swamps. Around you there are wooden barricades being erected for some oncoming seige upon the dark structure to the north of the island. All around you the sounds of men yelling and rushing about in a working frenzy can be heard. You can see the blackened walls of some fortress all around you. The island continues north, east and south.

Room.Name: On a muddy island battlefield
Room.Description: You are on a small island in the middle of Arkham's swamps. Around you there are wooden barricades being erected for some oncoming seige upon the dark structure to the north of the island. All around you the sounds of men yelling and rushing about in a working frenzy can be heard. To the north is what looks like a fortress or small island town with blackened walls surrounding it. The island continues all around you.

Room.Name: Beneath a wooden battlement
Room.Description: You are standing beneath what appears to be a rougly built battlement. The structure rises up on strong wooden supports and faces the black walls to the north. The muddy grounds extend all around you.

Room.Name: On a muddy island battlefield
Room.Description: You are on a small island in the middle of Arkham's swamps. Around you there are wooden barricades being erected for some oncoming seige upon the dark structure to the north of the island. All around you the sounds of men yelling and rushing about in a working frenzy can be heard. To the north you can see a large structure of blackened material and a gateway leading into it. The island continues all around you.

Room.Name: Beneath a wooden battlement
Room.Description: You are standing beneath what appears to be a rougly built battlement. The structure rises up on strong wooden supports and faces the black walls to the north. The muddy grounds extend all around you.

Room.Name: On a muddy island battlefield
Room.Description: You are on a small island in the middle of Arkham's swamps. Around you there are wooden barricades being erected for some oncoming seige upon the dark structure to the north of the island. All around you the sounds of men yelling and rushing about in a working frenzy can be heard. The island heads south and west, while to the east there seems to be a wide cleared path.

Room.Name: Outside a blackened wall
Room.Description: You are standing beneath a tall wall of blackened, charred rock. It looks as if some kind of fortress or small town was here but it appears mostly ruined and gutted now from recent battle. The walls continues east and west or you can go south into the muddy grounds of the swamp island.

Room.Name: Outside a blackened wall
Room.Description: You are standing beneath a tall wall of blackened, charred rock. It looks as if some kind of fortress or small town was here but it appears mostly ruined and gutted now from recent battle. The walls continues east and west or you can go south into the muddy grounds of the swamp island.

Room.Name: Outside a blackened wall
Room.Description: You are standing beneath a tall wall of blackened, charred rock. It looks as if some kind of fortress or small town was here but it appears mostly ruined and gutted now from recent battle. To the east you can see a large, blasted gate leading into the walls. The wall also continues west and the the muddy grounds of the swamp island lie south.

Room.Name: Before some blasted black gates
Room.Description: You are at the entrance to what appeared to be a large fortress of town of some kind. Now the gates of obsidian are blasted wide open by some powerful magic and smoke rises lazily above the burning rubble. The blackened walls head east and west around the ruins, while to the north a stone pathway heads into the ruins and towards a towering structure at it's centre. South of here lie the swampy grounds of the Arkham swamps.

Room.Name: Outside a blackened wall
Room.Description: You are standing beneath a tall wall of blackened, charred rock. It looks as if some kind of fortress or small town was here but it appears mostly ruined and gutted now from recent battle. To the west you can see a large, blasted gate leading into the walls. The wall also continues east and the the muddy grounds of the swamp island lie south.

Room.Name: Corner of the ruined walls
Room.Description: You have reached the eastern end of the burnt and charred walls. The wall leads north from here or you can go back west along it.

Room.Name: Corner of the ruined walls
Room.Description: The blackened walls end here at the edge of the swamp island. They continue to the north but there is no room to walk around them anymore. A large, crudely dug tunnel heads down here. The wall leads back east.

Room.Name: In a muddy trench
Room.Description: You are standing almost knee deep in swamp muck and water. The foul stench of the Arkham swamps is even worse down here in the confined trench. Around you there are small bits of flesh and blood floating in the waters, signs of the battles that have recently been fought. The trench continues north or you can go back up.

Room.Name: In a muddy trench
Room.Description: You are standing almost knee deep in swamp muck and water. The foul stench of the Arkham swamps is even worse down here in the confined trench. Around you there are small bits of flesh and blood floating in the waters, signs of the battles that have recently been fought. You can continue wading through the trench to the north or south.

Room.Name: At the end of a muddy trench
Room.Description: You are standing almost knee deep in swamp muck and water. The foul stench of the Arkham swamps is even worse down here in the confined trench. Around you there are small bits of flesh and blood floating in the waters, signs of the battles that have recently been fought. The trench ends here and the only way back is south.

Room.Name: Above a deep muddy trench
Room.Description: You have reached a pile of unpassable rubble that has fallen away from part of the ruined wall. To the east the Arkham swamps are blocking any movement, and the only ways you can go are back south or down into a deep muddy trench that has been dug here beside the ruined wall.

Room.Name: In a deep muddy trench
Room.Description: You are standing knee deep in swamp muck and water. The foul stench of the Arkham swamps is even worse down here in the confined trench. Around you there are small bits of flesh and blood floating in the waters, signs of the battles that have recently been fought. You can continue wading through the trench to the north, or head back up.

Room.Name: At the end of a muddy trench
Room.Description: You are standing almost knee deep in swamp muck and water. The foul stench of the Arkham swamps is even worse down here in the confined trench. Around you there are small bits of flesh and blood floating in the waters, signs of the battles that have recently been fought. The trench ends here and the only way back is south.

Room.Name: Beneath a wooden watch-tower
Room.Description: You are standing ankle deep in swamp muck and under the protective shelter of a small wooden tower. The swamp island continues west or you can go up onto the tower platform.

Room.Name: On a cleared part of the swamp island
Room.Description: You are on a large cleared part of the island. It seems that the ground here has been somehow dried up and hardened, almost as if torched with some hot flames. The clearing extends to the north where, in fact, the smell of smoke and ash is wafting in. The island itself heads back west onto the muddy ground.

Room.Name: Beneath a wooden watch-tower
Room.Description: You are standing ankle deep in swamp muck and under the protective shelter of a small wooden tower. The swamp island continues east or you can go up onto the tower platform.

Room.Name: On a small wooden watch-tower
Room.Description: You are on a small and badly built tower. The wind blows across you bringing the stench of the swamp and even from this height there is nothing but the cold dark swamplands to see. A ladder leads back down out of the tower.

Room.Name: On a small wooden watch-tower
Room.Description: You are on a small and badly built tower. The wind blows across you bringing the stench of the swamp and even from this height there is nothing but the cold dark swamplands to see. A ladder leads back down out of the tower.

Room.Name: In a muddy clearing
Room.Description: The ground here is wet and slippery with the swamp mud, but someone hsa made a small clearing to allow ease of movement.

Room.Name: On a wooden battlement
Room.Description: You are upon the makeshift battlement being used as an observation post during the battles. Black wisps of smoke rise up from where the recent fireballs have burnt the tower but newer materials have been brought in and hastily added to replace the old. The wooden planks lead east on the catwalk or you can go down the ladder to the muddy grounds below.

Room.Name: On a wooden battlement
Room.Description: Here in the centre of the wooden observation post you can see the blasted gates of the Legion walls to the north. From here you can see that most of the buildings in the town or fortress that lie ahead are now rubble but there is a large black tower that has somehow survived the battles almost unscathed. You can go east or west along the wooden catwalk.

Room.Name: On a wooden battlement
Room.Description: You are upon the makeshift battlement being used as an observation post during the battles. Black wisps of smoke rise up from where the recent fireballs have burnt the tower but newer materials have been brought in and hastily added to replace the old. The wooden planks lead west on the catwalk or you can go down the ladder to the muddy grounds below.

Room.Name: On a dark landing
Room.Description: You are on a landing of dark wood covered in unholy symbols. A winding stairwell leads down and there is an ebony grate in the west wall.

NPC.name: arkham guard
NPC.description: This man has been waiting for this moment for years. The assault on the tower of Arkham's Legion will put all his skills to test. The evil that resides here is strong, but he believes that good will triumph.
NPC.longDescription: An Arkham guard in darkened armor is preparing for the oncoming battle.

NPC.name: arkham ranger
NPC.description: The Arkham templars have more than just the holy warriors on their side. The rangers of the local lands have joined their attack on the Legion tower and are providing forward warning of any surprise counter attacks.
NPC.longDescription: A tall ranger in forest green armor is watching out for signs of trouble.

NPC.name: arkham crusader dwarf
NPC.description: This dwarf is the last of the true crusaders of Arkham. His fellow crusaders were massacred by the ancients of Legion and now he has come for revenge and a final reckoning. Whether he finds peace of mind or eternal peace of body is yet to be decided...
NPC.longDescription: A powerful dwarf regards the darkness around him with utter hatred.

NPC.name: templar arkham commander
NPC.description: This proud and royal paladin has lead the Arkham forces through the swamps to this island and is preparing for the assault on the Legion tower.
NPC.longDescription: A grand templar is here going over the final arrangements for the attack.

NPC.name: apprentice necromancer
NPC.description: Arrogant and evil, this young apprentice has the might of Legion behind him and has fears little. He is safe in his knowledge that the Masters will destroy the puny forces gathering outside the tower.
NPC.longDescription: A gaunt young student of necromancy glares at you with superior contempt.

NPC.name: apprentice demonologist
NPC.description: Arrogant and evil, this young apprentice has the might of Legion behind him and has fears little. He is safe in his knowledge that the Masters will destroy the puny forces gathering outside the tower.
NPC.longDescription: A black robed student sketches a hexagram in the air and points at you!

NPC.name: half nightwalker half-moon
NPC.description: This nightwalker is silent and watchful, acting as he has been taught by the Masters, but not truly grasping the essence of his true destiny. Until his powers are properly controlled he will remain little more than a pawn to the Masters of Legion as they cull out their weak in the oncoming battles.
NPC.longDescription: A nightwalker turns to watch you from the shadows.

NPC.name: apprentice anti-paladin anti
NPC.description: This young anti-paladin has the arrogance and evilness of one who hides amidst the might of Legion. He has yet to learn the true powers of darkness, and until then will be little more than battle-fodder to be used by the Masters until the weak have all been culled.
NPC.longDescription: A strong looking man with harsh black eyes regards you with pure disdain.

NPC.name: lesser zombie
NPC.description: This petty undead has been raised as practice for the new necromancers of Legion. The poor soul who's body was sacrificed for the studies was almost certainly an innocent person from nearby Arkham.
NPC.longDescription: A pale and badly formed zombie stumbles toward you.

NPC.name: skeleton
NPC.description: One of the weaker and less subtle forms of necromantic magic. The raising of this skeleton is the work of some eager apprentice's application of his unholy power.
NPC.longDescription: A poorly preserved skeleton is here serving it's master.

NPC.name: minor imp
NPC.description: This little imps has the eyes of something truly wicked. It peers at you with hungry eyes and hisses, awaiting release from it's master so it may feed!
NPC.longDescription: A small ghastly looking imp sits here watching you with malice.

NPC.name: hellion familiar
NPC.description: This little beast from the abyss seems to have broken it's enslavement to it's master and now just wants to FEED!
NPC.longDescription: A twisted hellion hisses and claws at you in hunger!

NPC.name: man black legion instructor
NPC.description: This man has risen high enough in the ranks of Legion to command the lower ranks of students, but has not the aptitude or influence to go further. He tasks his students hard, punishing them for his own failures and resents teaching those who may someday surpass his position.
NPC.longDescription: A man cloaked in black stands here watching the students.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Mage Warrior
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Sneak Hide DetectIllusion

NPC.name: legion guard
NPC.description: Big, dumb and ugly. This guard was probably one of the rejects from Arkham's normal guards and was instead recruited by Legion as meat-fodder in both the battles it undergoes, and as convenient meat for necromancers to practice on.
NPC.longDescription: A Legion guard is here preparing for the slaughter to come.

NPC.name: draconian legionaire legion
NPC.description: Very big, very dumb. This is the corps of Legion's dark mortal armies and serves as fodder in the fights it has against those that oppose Legion's might. Because of it's strength this one has been selected to remain in the tower during the oncoming raid by Arkham's guards.
NPC.longDescription: A draconian in black Legion robes hisses and glares with evil yellow eyes.

NPC.name: shadow
NPC.description: It is nothing but a trick of the light, a mere illusion of shadows. But it also has essence and seems quite capable of inflicting serious wounds...
NPC.longDescription: A flickering shadow tears through the darkness!

NPC.name: legion necromancer
NPC.description: This necromancer is one of the last remaining mid-rank mages of Legion to remain in the tower during the oncoming siege. He has stayed in order to maintain the undead forces that will fight while the Masters prepare the great powers at the top of the tower.
NPC.longDescription: A necromancer walks amongst the corpses granting unlife to them.

NPC.name: crescent nightwalker crescent-moon
NPC.description: This mid-rank nightwalker has remained in the tower while the rest of the mid-ranks have left for another Legion tower. This one remains to help build up the shadows that will fight in the oncoming battles while the Master nightwalkers prepare the great powers on the roof of the tower.
NPC.longDescription: A powerful nightwalker stands in the shadows breathing heavily.

NPC.name: monster zombie
NPC.description: This creature's corpse has been granted a new unlife, brought back for the duration to fight the invading knights of Arkham. It's dull, empty eyes show nothing but the emptiness of the undead.
NPC.longDescription: A huge zombie stares at you with a hunger unmatched by the living.

NPC.name: mummy
NPC.description: This body is nothing more than the animated remains of some poor victim, but in it's new unlife it possess strength unmatched by it's living self. It's arms reach out for you, seeking warmth and life that it itself has lost.
NPC.longDescription: A mummy wrapped in bloody rags shuffles towards you with outstretched arms.

NPC.name: skeleton
NPC.description: This skeleton is all that remains of some unfortunate victim that was unlucky enough to fall into the hands of Legion. With his or her flesh stripped away all that has been left is the skeletal frame that now lives on by neromantic power.
NPC.longDescription: A skeleton swivels it's skull around and stares right through you.

NPC.name: lord lich
NPC.description: This dark archmage has remained behind in the tower to help raise the army that will fight the invading Arkham guards, and he is NOT pleased by your sudden intrusion!
NPC.longDescription: A demonic man points in your direction and his eyes burn bright blue!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Mage AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary DetectIllusion Flying PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: blackheart guard
NPC.description: This massive giant has been assigned the duty of preventing any wayward undead from wandering from their room until the main battle begins. He also serves as a good deterant to anyone foolish enough to have come this far up into the tower.
NPC.longDescription: A huge guard that barely fits in the room is here guarding the way.

NPC.name: master necromancer
NPC.description: This necromancer is at the highest echelon of the Legion's archmages. He now seeks the ultimate power, that of lich-hood. But before he can continue with his studies the rabble that are preparing to raid the tower must be dealt with....with a soft hiss he prepares another powerful spell for the coming battle.
NPC.longDescription: A figure in black robes is weaving dweomers of ancient power.

NPC.name: master demon summoner
NPC.description: This master of the abyss is pulling together his power to call forth the demons that will aid in the destruction of Arkham's guards and an end to the opposition Legion has been facing here.
NPC.longDescription: A cowled figure raises it's arms and calls forth the darkness!

NPC.name: eclipsed nightwalker eclipsed-moon
NPC.description: This servant of ancient darkness walks between the planes of night and the material world, and has been called forth into the tower to guard against those who would oppose Legion's might.
NPC.longDescription: A deadly nightwalker steps out of the shadows.

NPC.name: anti anti-paladin
NPC.description: This anti-paladin stands powerful and dominating. There is nothing this evil incarnate will not do, and the blood that soaks them is their bath.
NPC.longDescription: An anti-paladin of demonic power is preparing for battle.

NPC.name: thuringwethil vampire
NPC.description: Upon closer inspection you can see that the mist that seems to surround this ancient vampire is, in fact, part of it. The darkness is so strong around it that it has formed a tangible, solid cloak of night.
NPC.longDescription: A vampire surrounded in a cloud of black smoke is guarding the way.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: greater demon pazuzu
NPC.description: The wings of this demon are razor sharp and beat slowly with deadly cutting might. It turns it's fierce red eyes upon you and screeches!
NPC.longDescription: A huge demon with blackened wings rises up to meet you!

NPC.name: shadow titan
NPC.description: One of the lesser titan's imprisoned within Malebolge has had it's sentence temporarily removed. It now lives trapped here as a shadow, bound by powerful magic to keep it guarding the tower.
NPC.longDescription: A massive shadow of a slain titan stands here in eternal service to the dark.
NPC.shortDescription: the shadow of a greater titan

NPC.name: black knight
NPC.description: This undead anti-paladin is hanging between full deathknight power and just mortal ability. He guards this turret as a way of showing his service to Legion, and in hope that the Lords of Legion will look upon him with favour and grant him the final step towards deathknight-hood, and immortality.
NPC.longDescription: The Black knight of Arkham's Legion stands here guarding his hall.

NPC.name: hooded figure necromancer
NPC.description: This is the head necromancer of the Arkham cabal of Legion. He serves as the prime mover of the region's undead power and is capable of calling upon even the most powerful undead in times of need. Right now he seems to be in the middle of an extremely powerful incantation...
NPC.longDescription: A hooded figure is here chanting soft necromantic words.

NPC.name: hooded figure demonologist
NPC.description: You gaze upon a hooded figure who raises it's head briefly. Beneath the cowl a skeletal face stares back at you with a lich's burning red eyes! It's eyes glow briefly and then it resumes building up it's magical hex with little care for your mortal prescence.
NPC.longDescription: A hooded figure raises it's hands and burns a flaming pentegram in the air.

NPC.name: hooded figure nightwalker
NPC.description: Dark faced creature dressed in a black robe gazes at you with his green eyes. Waves of fear pass around him and greater power fill air with hatred to all who can breath.
NPC.longDescription: A hooded figure is here breathing heavily.

NPC.name: hooded figure anti anti-paladin
NPC.description: You gaze upon one of the greatest anti-paladins of Legion, one who has fully attained immortal life in the form of a deathknight. He has remained here in the tower to destroy what puny forces Arkham may mount against Legion.
NPC.longDescription: A hooded figure stares through the darkness and right at you!

NPC.name: shadowlord
NPC.description: Nothing but pure darkness and glowing red eyes stare back at YOU! This being of incredible undead power is not pleased to have been raised forth and seeks life as payment.
NPC.longDescription: A creature from the negative plane reaches for your soul!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Mage Warrior

NPC.name: demogorgon
NPC.description: This is the Demogorgon, Queen of the Undead and ruler of one of the largest layers of the Abyss. Her prescence here on the mortal planes is almost unheard of and she herself is not pleased to be called forth. She turns her massive twin heads toward you and bellows in rage, demanding her release!
NPC.longDescription: A massive creature with twin ape heads thrashes within the pentegram.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Mage Warrior

NPC.name: vortex
NPC.description: This appears like a blackhole, where nothing that goes in comes back out. It would not be a good idea to stay around it too long...
NPC.longDescription: A gigantic vortex of negative energy surges violently upon the roof!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Mage Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: ebon black titan
NPC.description: This is one of the mighty titans sent to serve forever within the circle of hell named Malebolge. His summons here is both a release and an imprisonment. The relief from hell is only overcome by his overwhelming sense of pride and anger at being trapped by mere mortals. His service, to fight for Legion in the coming days, has only been gained through very costly sacrifices.
NPC.longDescription: A titanic man with beautiful ebon features stands chained to the roof.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: ancient gold dragon
NPC.description: This dragon has come to aid in the coming battle against Legion. It's time is nearing and it is weaker than it's size would indicate, but it wishes to do one last great thing for the cause of good before it passes on.
NPC.longDescription: A massive gold dragon rests idly as it waits patiently for battle.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Flying

NPC.name: red dragon
NPC.description: This dragon is awaiting the battle with Arkham's forces and it looking forward to a nice tasty meal of human flesh. Afterwards it will join the ranks of the undead by sacrificing it's mortal flesh to become a powerful dracolich. It wears an unholy amulet that will preserve it's essence during the transition, and is looking forward to the next stage of it's existence.
NPC.longDescription: A huge red dragon rises up and beats the air with it's massive wings!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Flying

NPC.name: black dragon
NPC.description: The power of Legion has seduced this ancient wyrm with the one thing it cannot accomplish itself..the becoming of a dracolich. It wears an amulet that will preserve it's essence during the weeks of change, at the end of which it will be raised as an undead dragon of immense power. For now it serves as help to Legion in the oncoming battles, a small favour for the immortality it will obtain once raised in lich form.
NPC.longDescription: A massive black silhoutte of a dragon stands out against the dark sky.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Flying

NPC.name: master necromancer
NPC.description: This necromancer is at the highest echelon of the Legion's archmages. He now seeks the ultimate power, that of lich-hood. But before he can continue with his studies the rabble that are preparing to raid the tower must be dealt with....with a soft hiss he prepares another powerful spell for the coming battle.
NPC.longDescription: A figure in black robes is invoking the powers of ancient magic.

NPC.name: master necromancer
NPC.description: This necromancer is at the highest echelon of the Legion's archmages. He now seeks the ultimate power, that of lich-hood. But before he can continue with his studies the rabble that are preparing to raid the tower must be dealt with....with a soft hiss he prepares another powerful spell for the coming battle.
NPC.longDescription: A black robed necromancer is here preparing words of death.

NPC.name: master demon summoner
NPC.description: This master of the abyss is pulling together his power to call forth the demons that will aid in the destruction of Arkham's guards and an end to the opposition Legion has been facing here.
NPC.longDescription: A cowled figure sketches symbols of darkness in the air before it.

NPC.name: master demon summoner
NPC.description: This master of the abyss is pulling together his power to call forth the demons that will aid in the destruction of Arkham's guards and an end to the opposition Legion has been facing here.
NPC.longDescription: A cowled figure's red eyes flare up and reveal a glaring skull!

NPC.name: legion guard
NPC.description: Big, dumb and ugly. This guard was probably one of the rejects from Arkham's normal guards and was instead recruited by Legion as meat-fodder in both the battles it undergoes, and as convenient meat for necromancers to practice on.
NPC.longDescription: A Legion guard glares around himself looking for a fight.

NPC.name: legion guard
NPC.description: Big, dumb and ugly. This guard was probably one of the rejects from Arkham's normal guards and was instead recruited by Legion as meat-fodder in both the battles it undergoes, and as convenient meat for necromancers to practice on.
NPC.longDescription: A Legion guard stands here guarding the tower from the oncoming invasion.

NPC.name: giant warrior
NPC.description: This giant has been hired by the Arkham council to help in the purging of the Legion tower. The warrior seems quite disgusted with the swamp muck and has trouble walking in it as his massive weight bogs him down. However in the coming battles his size will prove to be a match for even the most dangerous of Legion's undead forces.
NPC.longDescription: A towering giant is here clearing the rubble to make way for the invasion.

NPC.name: arkham knight
NPC.description: This man has been waiting for this moment for years. The assault on the tower of Arkham's Legion will put all his skills to test. The evil that resides here is strong, but he believes that good will triumph.
NPC.longDescription: A knight of Arkham is standing here ready for the battle to come.

NPC.name: arkham artillerist
NPC.description: This man has had a harrowing few days. The battle against the Legion has been tough on both him and his catapult, especially when the mages like to target them both for fiery destruction. Right now he's taking a breather as the next stages of the battle are prepared.
NPC.longDescription: An artillerist is here standing by to follow his orders.

NPC.name: legion archer
NPC.description: This guard of Legion has been assigned a suicide mission. Left here to fire at the Arkham guards as they begin their assault, it is a job with no hope. The life of this insignificant soldier means nothing, and the few minutes his life will buy are all the lords of Legion want.
NPC.longDescription: An archer is here ready to repel the oncoming invasion.

NPC.name: legion finest zombie
NPC.description: This is one of the zombies that will bring forth the damned on Judgement day. For now it remains in place without moving, waiting for the day when all life will end and the souls of the damned are brought forth for reckoning. Then, and only then, shall Legion's finest enter the pentegrams and take themselves up to the world above to perform their duties.
NPC.longDescription: A giant figure devoid of expression stands unmoving in the chill mists.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden DetectIllusion PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: lord judgement
NPC.description: This is the face of all damnation, residing here until the Final day. When It's time comes It shall rise up with Legion and the other Lord's of Judgement to claim the souls that are to be damned for eternity. Until then it rests here unmoving and uncaring.
NPC.longDescription: A black skeleton sits upon it's throne awaiting the day of Judgement.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Haste DetectIllusion

NPC.name: legion man cabal lord
NPC.description: This man has risen to the ultimate position in Legion through sheer power and evil. He nows stands here awaiting the Final call when he, and the select other few, will rise up through the pentegrams and call Judgement down upon all the living. Although much weaker in mortal form he mostly exists in the immortal planes and this body is but a fragment of his real power. He hold the final position in Legion's ranks and this is one of the two selected from the Arkham cabal of Legion.
NPC.longDescription: A deathly looking man stands here silent and unmoving.

NPC.name: elf girl
NPC.description: This girl is to be the next sacrifice in the calling of Legion's powers. She doesn't seem too hurt but she's cowering in the corner crying and has been dressed in a special gown designed for sacrificial ceremonies.
NPC.longDescription: A young elven girl is lying huddled in the corner of the room.

NPC.name: ethereal
NPC.description: This ethereal has been captured and imprisoned for Legion's use. It's essence is slowly being drained away from it and it's form has become almost solid as it loses it's misty form. Eventually all it's lifeforce will be taken and only the condensed mist of a vampiric ethereal will remain.
NPC.longDescription: An almost solid ethereal is here floating in despair.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Flying PassDoor DetectIllusion

NPC.name: ghoul
NPC.description: This is the hollow remains of what was once one of Legion's captives. He, or she now lives without any life or soul, trapped as a ghastly ghoul here in the cell.
NPC.longDescription: A disgusting ghoul cowers in the corner gnawing on some flesh.

NPC.name: brother arkham monk
NPC.description: This brother of the Arkham monks was kidnapped and imprisoned in order to steal his soul. Somehow he has overcome all the attempts and has been left here in his cell to rot during the oncoming raids. He himself seems unconcerned about it all and simply looks up at you momentarily before resuming his meditations.
NPC.longDescription: A placid looking monk rests here meditating in his captivity.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Haste DetectIllusion

NPC.name: dwarf
NPC.description: This poor dwarf seems to have had his mind and body tortured beyond his ability to withstand. He appears very mad and very insane, but the madness seems to have given him some unnatural strength too.
NPC.longDescription: A wild looking dwarf stares at you and screams incoherently!

NPC.name: guard
NPC.description: This unfortunate guard was probably summoned away from the battles and taken prisoner for various tortures and interrogations. Now he rests here awaiting his final fate when the mages of Legion have time to reduce him to a mere undead zombie to fight against his former friends.
NPC.longDescription: An Arkham guard is resting here in strong thick chains.

NPC.name: keeper prisonkeeper
NPC.description: This prisonkeeper is disgusting. He spends most of his time tormenting his prisoners with food which he then eats in front of them as they starve... probably why he's so fat. He has no hopes of rising any further in Legion's forces, and is in fact a sacrificial pawn left here to die in the battles.
NPC.longDescription: A fat, ugly man with a large key attached to his belt is here.

Item.Name: key
Item.LongDescription: A small black key is here.

Item.Name: key
Item.LongDescription: A small black key is here.

Item.Name: key
Item.LongDescription: A small black key is here.

Item.Name: key
Item.LongDescription: A small black key is here.

Item.Name: key
Item.LongDescription: A small black key is here.

Item.Name: guardian sword
Item.LongDescription: A guardian sword lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This sword is heavy but deadly.

Item.Name: suit plate darkened
Item.LongDescription: A suit of darkened platemail rests here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It is dark and heavy, but polished to a brilliant sheen.

Item.Name: helm darkened
Item.LongDescription: A darkened helm is on the ground.

ExtraDescription.Description: The helm looks heavy and strong.

Item.Name: tesar guardian bow
Item.LongDescription: A finely made bow is resting on the ground here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The bow appears to be made of some magically preserved wood. There is an almost holy warmth that can be felt coming off it's surface.

Item.Name: green battlemail battle mail suit
Item.ShortDescription: a suit of green tinted battlemail
Item.LongDescription: A bulky suit of frest green battlemail is here.

Item.Name: green boots
Item.LongDescription: A pair of fine forest green boots are here.

Item.Name: spiked gauntlet blood striking
Item.LongDescription: A spiked gauntlet lies in a pool of sticky red blood.

Item.Name: guardian sword
Item.LongDescription: A guardian sword lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This sword is heavy but deadly.

Item.Name: darkened shield
Item.LongDescription: A large darkened shield is here.

Item.Name: double double-edged bastard sword
Item.LongDescription: A huge double-edged bastard sword is here.

Item.Name: suit darkened platemail
Item.LongDescription: A suit of darkened platemail is here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Dark Evil Bless AntiEvil

ExtraDescription.Description: This is the standard battlearmor given to the commanders of Arkham's guard. In times past many other such suits have been made and been passed on, although some, such as Shadar Lunn's, have since become corrupt like their owners and now serve use for only the dark rather than the light.

Item.Name: wide belt darkened
Item.LongDescription: A wide belt made of some darkened metal is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This belt seems to be made of some stretched and bent pierce of darkened steel. It is not as flexible as normal belts but it provides much better protection and strength.

Item.Name: black longsword sword
Item.LongDescription: A black longsword is here on the ground.

Item.Name: black axe
Item.LongDescription: A large black axe is lying here.

Item.Name: wicked whip
Item.LongDescription: An evil looking whip is here waiting to be used on someone.

Item.Name: chainmail legion
Item.ShortDescription: chainmail marked with the symbol of Legion
Item.LongDescription: A set of chainmail marked with an inverted cross is here.

Item.Name: crescent moon crescent-moon scimitar
Item.LongDescription: A deadly scimitar in the shape of a crescent moon is here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Hum Dark Magic NoDrop AntiGood AntiNeutral

Item.Name: rune death
Item.LongDescription: A small rune with strange symbols of necromancy lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The symbols depict fire, ice and darkness, all combined into a single object of death.

Item.Name: pitch-black black robes
Item.LongDescription: A pile of pitch-black robes is lying here.

Item.Name: strife spear
Item.LongDescription: A large jagged spear of pure black material is here.

Item.Name: pitch-black black ring
Item.LongDescription: A small pitch-black ring lies here.

Item.Name: bloodstone dagger
Item.LongDescription: A dagger made from blood-red rock is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This dagger is made from the stone upon which an innocent victim was sacrificed in the name of the dark. The soul of the damned victim now resides within it forever seeking to drink upon the warm souls of the living.

Item.Name: obsidian steel hexagram staff
Item.LongDescription: A long steel staff tipped with an obsidian hexagram is here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Dark Evil Magic NoDrop

Item.Name: eyes darkness
Item.LongDescription: An obsidian rock carved into the shape of an eye is here.

Item.Name: eclipsed-moon eclipsed moon ring
Item.LongDescription: A ring with the picture of an eclipsed-moon on it is lying here.

Item.Name: shadow shield
Item.LongDescription: A shield of pure black is lying on the ground.

Item.Name: butchers butcher blade
Item.LongDescription: A large serated butcher's blade is here.

Item.Name: suit legion battle armor
Item.ShortDescription: a suit of Legion battle armor
Item.LongDescription: A huge set of armor with an inverted cross burnt into it is here.

Item.Name: thuringwethil cloak
Item.LongDescription: A strange cloak lies on the ground.

Item.Name: wings demon black feather
Item.LongDescription: A huge pair of wings made from black demon feathers is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: These wings are HUGE. They provide little protecton, in fact they even hinder movement and are probably going to get their wearer caught in some bad places when movement is desirable. But they do have some razor sharp feathers that provide extremely sharp edges.

Item.Name: claw demon burnt sigils
Item.ShortDescription: a massive claw etched with burnt sigils
Item.LongDescription: A huge claw from some unspeakable beast lies here.

Item.Name: sword demonslayer
Item.LongDescription: A large sword is lying here.

Item.Name: helm black horn
Item.ShortDescription: a helm with a single black horn
Item.LongDescription: A helm adorned with a single sharp black horn is here.

Item.Name: scroll ancient necromancy
Item.LongDescription: A scroll with arcane symbols of necromancy is lying here.

Item.Name: robes undead
Item.LongDescription: A pile of black cloth sits motionless in the room.

Item.Name: lich hand
Item.ShortDescription: the severed hand of a lich
Item.LongDescription: A horrible twitching hand is lying on the ground.
Item.ExtraFlags: Dark Evil Magic NoDrop AntiGood AntiNeutral NoRemove VisDeath Flaming Frost Vorpal TwoHands Shocking Poison

ExtraDescription.Description: This hand provides a deadly conduit to the negative planes, unfortunately it is very hard to make contact with a victim as it has little range. This also makes it very poor for defending oneself with, although by virtue of it's powerful magic it provides very good protection against magics.

Item.Name: pitch-black black bracelet
Item.LongDescription: A pitch-black bracelet is here.

Item.Name: sickle bone
Item.ShortDescription: a sickle of carved human bone
Item.LongDescription: A large bone in the shape of a sickle is here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Dark Evil Magic Vorpal TwoHands Shocking Poison

Item.Name: armguards arm demon scale greater
Item.LongDescription: Some armguards fashioned from hardened demon scale is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: These scales have been forged into a set of extermely strong, very sharp armguards. The edges are sharp enough to cut steel and in combat would be deadly. Unfortunately their massive weight and bulk make them quite hard to move about in, and greatly hinder ones ability to actually hit.

Item.Name: cloak shadows
Item.LongDescription: A strange shadowy cloak is floating in the air here.

Item.Name: figurine death
Item.LongDescription: A small figurine of a hooded man is sitting here.

Item.Name: unholy avenger sword
Item.LongDescription: A large two-handed sword with dark inscriptions upon it is here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Hum Dark Evil AntiGood AntiNeutral NoRemove Flaming Frost Vorpal TwoHands Shocking Poison

ExtraDescription.Description: This dark blade appears to be made for pure destruction and hasn't even been given a basic cross-piece for defence. The blade, however, is of superb make and thrums with an inner power that only the darkest mages could have empowered.

Item.Name: razor-edged razor ring
Item.LongDescription: A small ring with sharp razor-edges is here.

Item.Name: cloak underworld
Item.LongDescription: A deathly black cloak lies here unused and unmoving.

Item.Name: sceptre dead
Item.LongDescription: A long bone sceptre is here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Dark Evil Magic NoDrop NoRemove

ExtraDescription.Description: This piece of bone is one of the specially enchanted relics of the underworld. Lord of the dead use them to hold sway over their minions, and it is rumoured that such an item can command respect even from the most powerful undead.

Item.Name: hammer black flames
Item.ShortDescription: a hammer shrouded in black flames
Item.LongDescription: A hammer shrouded in black flames is laying here, absorbing the light.

Item.Name: girdle titanic strength
Item.LongDescription: A huge girdle from some giant is here.

Item.Name: corpse
Item.LongDescription: A corpse of a slain elf is here.

Item.Name: corpse
Item.LongDescription: A corpse of burnt dwarf is lying here.

Item.Name: corpse
Item.LongDescription: A corpse of some creature is rotting away here.

Item.Name: skeleton
Item.ShortDescription: a skeleton of a decayed creature
Item.LongDescription: A skeleton with sticky bits of decayed flesh is here.

Item.Name: pile bodies
Item.LongDescription: A pile of hacked and blood drenched bodies is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This pile of corpses seems to be arranged in a ritualistic pattern, as if being prepared for some kind of dark sacrifice. From the looks of it there seems to be several elf girls, some dwarf children and a baby of some kind here.

Item.Name: scroll paper
Item.LongDescription: A scroll of paper with a few words written on it is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: There is a diagram of a pentegram and the words in the centre of it: 'Yal Dagon Nar Sothoth' Beneath this is a diagram of 4 small pentegrams with arrows going from one to another and the word, 'karguska'.

Item.Name: dark scroll paper
Item.LongDescription: A dark scroll of paper with a few words written on it is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The scroll reads: Upon the bodies of three elf maidens, two dwarf children and a human baby speak the words of raising after the final preprations have been done. 'Yal nosferatu vampyri sothoth' Beneath this is a diagram of 4 small pentegrams with arrows going from one to another and the word, 'karguska'.

Item.Name: guardian bow
Item.LongDescription: A finely made bow is resting on the ground here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The bow appears to be made of some magically preserved wood. There is an almost holy warmth that can be felt coming off it's surface.

Item.Name: cowl black
Item.LongDescription: A pure black cowl of strange material is here.

Item.Name: razor-edged razor ring
Item.LongDescription: A small ring with sharp razor-edges is here.

Item.Name: corpse
Item.ShortDescription: the corpse of an arkham guard
Item.LongDescription: A corpse of an arkham guard is lying here.

ExtraDescription.Description: Looks like one of the guards of arkham has done his last day of duty.

Item.Name: corpse
Item.ShortDescription: the corpse of a young girl
Item.LongDescription: A corpse of young girl is lying here.

ExtraDescription.Description: Looks like the youth of this victim had some kind of appeal to the necromancers performing the deadly rituals in here.

Item.Name: cowl black
Item.LongDescription: A pure black cowl of strange material is here.

Item.Name: gold dragon orb
Item.LongDescription: A large orb of glinting gold is lying here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks almost like pure gold, but as you look closer at it you realise it is in fact the product of a gold dragon's magical influence on the rocks around it.

Item.Name: helm gold dragon skull
Item.ShortDescription: a helm stylized into a gold dragon skull
Item.LongDescription: A beautifully crafted helm shaped like a gold dragon's skull is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This helm looks like the pride and honor of some extremely exceptional smith. The workmanship is superb and it is a great tribute to the race of Gold dragons.

Item.Name: gold dragon scale shield curved
Item.LongDescription: A large piece of curved gold scale is on the ground.

Item.Name: gold dragon scale leggings
Item.ShortDescription: the leg scales of a gold dragon
Item.LongDescription: Some large golden scales shaped to fit legs are here.

Item.Name: wood wooden barricade
Item.LongDescription: A large wooden barricade has been erected here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks pretty fragile but provides some small protection against normal arrows and rocks.

Item.Name: rubble
Item.LongDescription: A huge pile of rocks and rubble lie here.

Item.Name: corpse
Item.ShortDescription: the corpse of an arkham guard
Item.LongDescription: The corpse of a badly mangled Arkham guard is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This body seems to have been killed by some tremendous force. Strangely enough the other bodies nearby are all also of Arkham soldiers and there is a lack of Legion bodies.

Item.Name: catapult
Item.LongDescription: A large catapult is standing here loaded for battle.

ExtraDescription.Description: This machine has seen some heavy use recently. The elastic windings used to power it are worn and frayed and there are scorch marks all over it from where Legion mages have blasted it. Many of the parts seem recently bolted on as if it has been rebuilt multiple times.

Item.Name: corpse
Item.ShortDescription: the corpse of an arkham guard
Item.LongDescription: An Arkham guard's corpse lies half buried in the mud.

Item.Name: corpse
Item.ShortDescription: the corpse of an arkham knight
Item.LongDescription: A knight's corpse lies face down in the swampy waters.

Item.Name: trebuchet
Item.LongDescription: A trebuchet with a broken draw-string is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This huge crossbow is aimed inward at the blackened gates north of here. It seems broken now from constant use in the earlier battles.

Item.Name: hammer judgement
Item.LongDescription: A massive hammer is here thrumming with power!
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Dark Evil Invisibility Magic NoDrop NoRemove Vorpal TwoHands Shocking Poison

ExtraDescription.Description: This is the hammer of Final judgement, used to condemn souls to the abyss. On the Final day of Judgement when all souls are judged this hammer is one of the weapons that will be used to smite the accursed and to send them to hell for all eternity.

Item.Name: flask damnation
Item.LongDescription: A flask of black liquid is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This contains the essence of damnation and the destruction of all life.

Item.Name: redemption
Item.LongDescription: A flash of black liquid is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This contains the essence of redemption to be granted to those who's souls are judged worthy of eternal reward.

Item.Name: blood red dragonstar amulet
Item.LongDescription: A blood-red amulet is lying here.

Item.Name: black dragonstar amulet
Item.LongDescription: A pitch-black amulet is lying here.

Item.Name: black key
Item.LongDescription: A large black key is here.

Item.Name: belt interlinking rose thorns
Item.ShortDescription: a belt of interlinking rose thorns
Item.LongDescription: A blood soaked belt made from some interlinking rose thorns is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This belt is soaked in blood from it's previous owner. It seems to be made for torture rather than armor although anyone fighting with it could easily tear their opponents skin on it.

Item.Name: white sacrificial gown
Item.LongDescription: A white gown covered in arcane runes is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It seems to be decorated in dark runes of pain and sacrifice. Not a nice item at all.

Item.Name: light harmony
Item.LongDescription: A brilliant white light shines here against the darkness.

ExtraDescription.Description: This light is the lasting peace of an elven maiden's inner soul. It has gathered her energy and built into a real power that helps the elf in a time of great need.

Item.Name: chewed flesh
Item.LongDescription: A large bit of half-eaten flesh is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's disgusting, who knows what sort of germs are on it...

Item.Name: ring flesh
Item.LongDescription: A large ring with flesh grafted onto it is here.

Item.Name: cap abbott
Item.LongDescription: A plain cloth cap is here.

Item.Name: talisman inner strength
Item.LongDescription: A small talisman is here.

Item.Name: spiked boots
Item.LongDescription: A pair of large boots with a mean spike in them is here.

Item.Name: iron shackles
Item.LongDescription: A set of iron shackles lie here.

Item.Name: firebrand sword
Item.LongDescription: A sword flickering with orange flames is here.

Item.Name: mist misty essence
Item.LongDescription: A strange mist is floating in the air here.

Item.Name: infinite libram conjuration
Item.LongDescription: A strange libram with glowing runes lies on the ground.
